ComicInfo.Characters: Edgar Allan Poe,Mickey Mantle,Sylvester P. Smythe,Wilbur Wright,Jeanne d'Arc,Humphrey Bogart,Napoleon Bonaparte,Christopher Columbus,Orville Wright
ComicInfo.Title: New Big Book Bonanza; Dapperman!; Momrine for Your Eye; What if There Had Been Guidance Counselors Throughout History?; A Little Off the Top!; Take Me Out to the Old Cracked Ball Game; The Cracked Campaign Against Foreign Travel; Famous Scenes From Great Lawyer-Type Movies! (That Just Missed); Believe It - Nuts!; The Cracked World of Children's TV Shows; Pill Dall; Special Clocks for Different Jobs; Cracked Cracks; How a Rumor Gets Started; Products that Just Missed!; Super Market Hospitals; Shut-Ups!; Guide to College Reunion Conversation
ComicInfo.Summary:
Troubleday Book Club offers 18 new books, with titles such as "Of Human Bandage" by The Mummy and "A Comedy of Errors: The Story of the N.Y. Mets."
A satire of superheroes.
Ad for Momrine - eyedrops for cyclops.
A werewolf gets a haircut.
12 1-panel gags.
5 single panel gags.
ComicInfo.Writer: George Gladir,Boj,Bill Ward,Paul Laikin,Art Pottier,Don Orehek,Len Herman,J. Kiernan,Jack O'Brien
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin,Boj,Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,Vic Martin,Jack Davis,Len Herman,J. Kiernan,Art Pottier,Don Orehek,Jack O'Brien,Al Jaffee
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,Boj,Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,Vic Martin,Jack Davis,Art Pottier,Don Orehek,Len Herman,J. Kiernan,Jack O'Brien,Al Jaffee
